p: Grief counseling for people who have lost their family members due to COVID-19, or those who lose family members due to other epidemics and disasters, is critical. Strategies such as stress reduction, conflict resolution, crisis call centers, child protection, and custody conflict mitigation are some areas of emphasis for psycho-social service providers. It is also so important to pay attention to the possibility of deprived families who have infected members due to the stigma caused by the disease, and provide special support for them to ensure their access to essential facilities and services.
